attributes.action: abolish  the administrative courts and tribunals  maladministrating on remits and contracts, particularly the  Royal Courts of Justice  who have  no fair regulation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That if a Government organisation , Agency  or Court  or person has caused  injustice and civil liberties abuse because of the  way it is  structured[ approximated funding - corporate director ]  one should be able to meet  urgently individually with someone who can resolve, especially if disabled . 
At the moment  no lawyer, barrister public or private, wants to know unless charging mercenary amounts of money.
 This corruption need weeding out as well as LA  & BENEFITS  hiring out the  Courts with own admin  on remits and  barristers on contracts making dishonest decisions without discretion .Also setting themselves up in competition with general public.They are abusing their power by destroying evidence on purpose.
